Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.24957834] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC =5 microM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC =20 microM), S. Salmonella typhimurium (MIC =5 microM), Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC =5 microM) ;Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC =10 microM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.24957834] Some peptides at 50 μM led to about 10% hemolysis against human red blood cells, but in general, negligible hemolytic activity is observed even at 100 μM and 200 μM peptide.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-nagative and Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Structural insights into and activity analysis of the antimicrobial peptide myxinidin.
Literature.Author: Cantisani M, Finamore E, Mignogna E, Falanga A, Nicoletti GF, Pedone C, Morelli G, Leone M, Galdiero M, Galdiero S.
